entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
